Key Match Events: Ecuador scored the first goal of the match in the 25th minute.
Chile struggled to create dangerous opportunities in the final third.
Ecuador defended well to maintain their lead.
Both teams made substitutions to adjust their strategies.
Pre-Game Insights: Ecuador and Chile both fielded their full squads with no injuries.
Ecuador was favored due to their better form and quality.
The match was crucial for both teams' World Cup qualification hopes.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Referee Anderson Daronco oversaw the match with his experience.
The match was broadcast on Marca Claro via YouTube for streaming.
Other matches in the qualifiers included Brazil vs Argentina and Paraguay vs Colombia.
Others: The match was held at Estadio Rodrigo Paz Delgado in Ecuador.
